import {useParams, Link} from "react-router-dom" import { useState, useContext } from "react" import { Context } from "../../Context" import ProductsInCart from "../elements/ProductsInCart"; import ContactsWindow from "../elements/ContactsWindow"; export default function Cart() { const {cartItems, records} = useContext(Context) const [isHidden, setIsHidden] = useState("hidden") const sum = Object.keys(cartItems).length? Object.entries(cartItems).map(([key, value]) => ( records.filter(r => r.id === key)[0].fields.Цена * value )).reduce((a, b) => a + b) : 0 console.log(sum) return (

Корзина

{ Object.keys(cartItems).length? <>

Сумма: {sum} ₽

:

Пока что в корзине пусто!

}
) }
